staxel.village.dialogue.RemMerchant.line: Hey ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
It's good to see you again. Not that it's been that long.
So... ^c:1486b0;Tomti^c:pop; and I have been talking.
I tried to convince him to stay with us at the ^c:1486b0;Treetop Village^c:pop;
But he never really felt at home there...
And I don't want him living in those caves again. They're not that... healthy.
He need to have people around him. Especially kind people like you.
So our family has come to an agreement. We think it would be best for him to settle down here.
So he can make some friends with the others here.
Anyway, we were grabbing some belongings for him in that musty old cave.
And I noticed there was a ton of furniture just laying around.
I tried moving some of it. But more just kept appearing!
So I figured, why don't I try to sell the junk.
We could definitely use a bit more income at the ^c:1486b0;Treetop Village^c:pop;.
This way I can keep track of Tomti. Just in case he goes missing again...
And I can also see ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; occasionally! Though he is always really busy.
Anyways, have a look around, see if there's anything you like!
It seems like ^c:1486b0;Tomti^c:pop; has settled in really well.
Its nice to see him happy these days.
Anything you like ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;?
If not, I'll be back another day.
There is always more to sell!
It seems like Leif has been avoiding me...
Do you think he still holds a grudge?
Or is it because he thinks I'm competing with him?
Cecile has been sizing me up recently...
I... don't think I want to see what she has in mind.
Leif always got caught in her experiments...
